Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells transfected with wild-type and mutant PINK1 constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression of PINK1 c.493C>T was undetectable compared to wild-type.
Protein expression of PINK1 c.509G>A was reduced by 70% compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% of wild-type.

Material used.Description: Immunoprecipitation was performed using HEK293 cells expressing PINK1 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: No detectable interaction with parkin in immunoprecipitation assays.
Reduced interaction with parkin (50% of wild-type levels).

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Interaction with parkin greater than 80% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Interaction with parkin less than 50% of wild-type.

Material used.Description: Immunofluorescence was performed on mouse brain tissue expressing PINK1 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: No detectable localization of PINK1 to mitochondria in immunofluorescence.
Reduced mitochondrial localization of PINK1 (30% of wild-type levels).

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Mitochondrial localization greater than 80% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Mitochondrial localization less than 50% of wild-type.
